E

Enemy - Class in src.Enemy
This class handles all enemy mobs.
Enemy(double, double, EnemyType) - Constructor for class src.Enemy.Enemy
Initialise the enemy with a given location in the world and a given enemy type.
EnemyType - Class in src.Enemy
This class stores the stats of an enemy type so that it can be retrieved easily when a new enemy is instantiated
EnemyType(String, int, int, int, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class src.Enemy.EnemyType
Initialise a new enemy type
EnemyTypeHandler - Class in src.Enemy
Stores all enemy types so that they can be retrieved when a new enemy is instantiated
EnemyTypeHandler() - Constructor for class src.Enemy.EnemyTypeHandler
 
Entity - Class in src.GameObjects
Any object that exists in the game world is an Entity
Entity(double, double, double, ArrayList<Image>) - Constructor for class src.GameObjects.Entity
Instantiate a new entity in the game world
EntityHandler - Class in src.GameObjects
Handles all FOREGROUND entities.
EntityHandler() - Constructor for class src.GameObjects.EntityHandler
 
exit() - Static method in class src.GUI.GameScreen
Exit the main game and go back to the previous screen
exit() - Static method in class src.Main.GameHandler
Exit the whole game and end the game process.
